scripts.dev: bun run --env-file=.env.development infra:up && bun run --env-file=.env.development migrate && concurrently "bun run --env-file=.env.development api" "bun run --env-file=.env.development ui"
scripts.migrate: bun run wait:db && bun run --cwd api-server migrate:dev
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd api-server lint && bun run --cwd remix-app lint
scripts.build: bun run --cwd api-server build && bun run --cwd remix-app build
